title: BRIEF-Worleyparsons Says Shareholders Passed Special Resolution To Change Name Of Co To Worley Ltd
text:
BRIEF-Worleyparsons Says Shareholders Passed Special Resolution To Change Name Of Co To Worley Ltd

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 22:28)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Worleyparsons Says Shareholders Passed Special Resolution To Change Name Of Co To Worley Ltd Oct 23 (Reuters) - WorleyParsons Ltd : * AT ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING ON 21 OCT, SHAREHOLDERS PASSED SPECIAL RESOLUTION TO CHANGE NAME OF CO TO WORLEY LTD

BRIEF-Worleyparsons Says Shareholders Passed Special Resolution To Change Name Of Co To Worley Ltd
